item.description: Learn to Roll! Improve your Roll! Learn a new Roll! Cheri Perry and Turner Wilson of Kayak Ways LLC, are offering Rolling Instruction. We teach Greenlandic Technique these skills are easily transferrable to all kayaks and blades. If you aren't familiar with our teaching techniques, check our website. wwwkayakways.net or check out our new DVD, "This is the Roll!", which can be purchased from our site. We start the evening with a demo promptly at 5pm, followed by one on one instruction, as well as peer mentoring guided by us. Limited to 6 folks per night. We offer Rolling kayaks to those who need them, as well as tuiliqs and paddles. Bring clean kayaks! Most nights we will be eating out somewhere afterwards, all are invited to join us!
item.how_to_find_us: The Pool entrance is around the left side of the building in the back.
item.name: Biddeford Y Pool Rolling Instruction
